message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think it's a great opportunity for you to get your hands on it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to sell the product. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $100 for the product.
Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I'm willing to consider it, but I think the product is worth more than that. I'm willing to sell it to you for $130.
I understand your position, Alice. However, I still believe we can come to an agreement closer to my previous offer. I am willing to pay $110 for the product.
I understand your persistence, Bob! I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $125.
